name: Hoard Survival Elite
description:
Hoard Survival Elite is a wave survival game where you are an astronaut on a hostile alien world and have to survive wave upon wave of enemies. The game utilises a multiplier score system that means the more kills you get in a short amount of time, the bigger you score increase promoting players to stay in combat and be more reckless. Note the game utilises a controller instead of keyboard and mouse for the controls.

This was a collaborative project from Team 8 in 2019
